channel.title: Ao Oni
channel.description:
So... when RIP4D posted this in the funny pictures thread, I started searching it up, its like a weird japanese version of amnesia, and its funny in a ton of ways, played it, and it takes some thinking, discuss :) I think this is the original release thread http://thecolorless.net/thread/491551
Instructions to download and install correctly there

item.title: Ao Oni
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

At one point, were Ao Oni is eating that girl, and he looks down at you, it looks fucking creepy lol

Read full topic

item.title: Ao Oni
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9`, post:2, topic:422507”]I don’t understand how people find this scary, it just makes you jump when that monster suddenly appears from behind…[/quote]Its scary when you play it. Yeah, its jump scares, but you never know when the Ao Oni will jump out. Most of the fear is anticipation. And its VERY fun with friends

Also, this is a link for the more recent version of the game: http://mygames888.info/zip/aooni_en.zip

Read full topic
